author: Will Shanklin
title: Movies Anywhere will soon shut down its Screen Pass content-sharing feature
description: Movies Anywhere announced Wednesday that it’s soon shutting down Screen Pass, its movie-sharing feature launched during COVID-19 lockdowns. The Disney-owned platform didn’t provide a reason for the closure.“As the experience continues to evolve, we want to no…
